title.rendered: Best New York Summer Outfits For You

content.rendered:
Sandals break, shorts go out of style, and your favorite hat gets borrowed once, twice, and it’s gone. Whether you are replacing lost loves or you need a summer clothing do-over, here is a list for you to shop in NYC. Roomi help you find amazing summer outfits in New York! So, guys and gals, take your roommate along, turn it into a weekend outing, and enjoy the free AC.

Find New York Summer Outfits at H&M

H&M’s practical yet fashionable designs are a testament to the fact that you don’t have to suffer for fashion. They have a complete selection for men, women, and kids. H&M has tons of New York summer outfits that will keep you cool and stylish.

They’ve also got sportswear for anyone running from shade to shade in Central Park. With 1,000 new summer arrival items, there’s bound to be something exciting that you haven’t tried yet. They have 39 locations in NYC alone, so wherever you live, they’ve got a store reasonably close by.

See also: The Perks Of Co-living in NYC

In Support Of: Unique shop in NYC

A brick and mortar shop in a meat-packing district might not catch your fancy as a place to go for summer outfits in New York. But In Support Of is a unique store where up-and-coming fashion designers can showcase their latest designs, and the money goes to various charity organizations and causes.

And don’t worry, the meat-packing district is just the origin-story of this heroic fashion center. The store was actually relocated to 250 Elizabeth Street in Nolita in downtown NYC so you won’t have to remember which bag has the cute summer hat and which one has the meatloaf.

Shop in NYC with great deals: Century 21

Century 21 is famous for sample sales and offers greatly discounted prices on a host of summer items. Here you’ll find New York summer outfits at its best! Clothes for men, women, and kids abound. Lots and lots of accessories are up for grabs at prices lower than you might think. This shop in NYC has got a surprising number of tech choices too. Film your BFF’s beach misadventure with a new camera or jam to your summer tunes with stylish and comfortable new headphones.

New York Summer Outfits At Barney’s

If you’re looking for a designer goods shop in NYC, try Barney’s in downtown. Reopened in 2016, this beautiful store has a restaurant called Fred’s built in. So you can literally shop all day. They cater to women, men, and kids, so nobody has to feel left out. While certainly not the cheapest option on the list by any stretch of the imagination, the style choices are strong and expressive if you’re looking to make a summer statement.

Related: How to Save Money While Living in Midtown East, NYC

Urban Jungle: affordable shop in NYC

Not everyone wants to spend a full month’s rent on an accessory item. Enter the Urban Jungle if you’re financially frugal and looking for something functional and cheap, but wouldn’t mind if a few stylish options crossed your path. Use this store for fashionable New York summer outfits for any budget. Also, at the same time, make a statement!

Like so many thrift stores, it’s pretty hit or miss when you stalk the jungle, but when you come across a real gem priced at thrift store prices, it’s worth bragging about to your friends. That covers a lot of different bases, from top end designer clothes to the penny-pincher’s dream store.

What’s your favorite shop for summer outfits in New York City? Post your comments below.

D’you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers to shop the best summer outfits in New York City? With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match! Download the app here and hop on the easiest ride home, ever!

jetpack-related-posts.title: 3 of the Best Ways to Survive the Summer in NYC
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: With Summer in full swing, it’s time for flip-flops, shorts, and sleep deprivation. If the sweltering heat is keeping you awake at night, rest easy knowing that relief is on the way. Take a look at three of the best ways to survive the summer in NYC and plan a…

img.alt_text: A woman spending a summer afternoon swimming in a pool

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreaming Of A Post Pandemic World: Upcoming Festivals In NYC
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you're anything like us, you're dreaming of a post-pandemic world too. And you're craving to travel and explore the outdoors again in a mask-free world. However, the world is still out and about with precautions in place. Thankfully, there are great festivals in New York to enjoy the warmth…

img.alt_text: A female mannequin wearing a wig and shades with balloons and other festive decoration around

jetpack-related-posts.title: What To Do If You’re Moving When It’s HOT
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: It’s. So. Hot. Your sweat hisses when it hits the sidewalk in the heat of the summer. Pigeons lay in the shade at the parks. You’re pretty sure you just saw a cockroach wearing a straw hat, sunglasses, and a Hawaiian t-shirt carrying a miniature suitcase down into the sewers.…

img.alt_text: A person walking on a road in the heat of the summer

jetpack-related-posts.title: Thrifting In Brooklyn With Max & Caroline
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you've seen 2 Broke Girls, you'll know all about living on a shoestring budget. Living on a budget might be challenging, but that doesn't mean you have to sacrifice your style. Thrifting is a fantastic way to shop on a budget while still finding cool items. As honorary members…

img.alt_text: Caroline and Max, two broke girls thrifting in Brooklyn

jetpack-related-posts.title: Find Roommates In NYC That Love Music!
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Music is a universal language, and you are totally fluent. You love going to concerts, discovering new bands, and maybe even playing an instrument yourself. Roomi makes it quick and easy to find roommates in New York City that share your obsessions, so you should have no trouble connecting with…

img.alt_text: find roommates in NYC that love the same music as you

jetpack-related-posts.title: A guide to the abundant outdoors of New York (Part 1)
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 2020 made us more familiar with the outdoors than any of us started out thinking at the beginning of 2020. And in the summers we're usually everywhere, from Prosper Park to the Hudson River Greenway. It doesn't matter you're looking to find a new hobby, revive an old one, or…
